abstract: TruantToday claims that it can also improve grades, lower dropout rates and reduce crime.
snippet: TruantToday claims that it can also improve grades, lower dropout rates and reduce crime.
lead_paragraph: Founded in January, TruantToday is a messaging service that alerts parents instantly via text and e-mail message when students cut class. The goal? Reducing truancy and restoring state and federal financing to school districts, which can lose as much as $50 each day that a student is missing.

headline.main: High School Entrepreneurs Promise to Save Millions for Schools
